title: Smartphone-Based Educational Program for Chronic Disease Management and Cardiac Health

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Medical Terminology and Basic Smartphone Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning via smartphone apps in limited tech environments (no PC ownership), combined with weekly face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Learners can explain major risk factors and prevention strategies for cardiovascular diseases
Learners can practice daily health monitoring methods such as blood pressure and blood glucose management
Learners can develop chronic disease management plans using app-based learning content

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
